amendment.description: To increase the amount provided for fire department staffing assistance grants, and to provide offsets.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3630 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3630 proposed by Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S9167-9171, S9183-9184) To increase the amount provided for fire department staffing assistance grants, and to provide offsets.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3630 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3630 proposed by Senator Dodd.
